articles.author: Uliana Pavlova and Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: Russia cuts off gas exports to Europe via Nord Stream indefinitely
articles.description: Russia won't immediately resume exports of natural gas to Europe through its Nord Stream 1 pipeline, worsening a shortage that threatens to tip the continent into an energy crisis this winter.
articles.content: Russia won't immediately resume exports of natural gas to Europe through its Nord Stream 1 pipeline, worsening a shortage that threatens to tip the continent into an energy crisis this winter.

articles.author: Jason Samenow
articles.title: Danielle is 2022′s first Atlantic hurricane — and it’s a strange one
articles.description: Hurricane Danielle is the latest first hurricane since 2013 and developed unusually far north in record-warm ocean waters.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump FBI raid: DOJ releases more details on documents taken from Mar-a-Lago

articles.title: White House fires back at Republicans planning to challenge student loan forgiveness

articles.title: Texas, Arizona bus migrants to U.S. cities, and now Chicago. Here's what could happen next
articles.description: Thousands of migrants are being bused from the border to New York, Washington and now Chicago. Advocates say the plans could backfire on the states that started them
